message.body: Did you notice Miriam in the corner of the HONY post you shared? Is that why you posted it?
Yep, that is why. I saw that a week ago and didnt notice her but she pointed it out this weekend
On thurs I'm giving a presentation on neurological conditions, is it ok if i mention you?
As in, this is my sister, i love her, she has a shunt and i am so happy that she is healthy
Haha yeah go for it, yay hydrocephalus awareness
